DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 study assess ability 11C- 18F-choline detect localize prostate cancer within prostate gland patient unfavorable intermediate high-risk prostate cancer ( CAPRA 5-10 ) . Secondary objective assess ability 11C- 18F-choline PET/MR detect metastatic prostate cancer within pelvic lymph node patient undergo radical prostatectomy extend pelvic lymph node dissection , assess ability 11C- 18F-choline PET/MR detect specific location metastatic prostate cancer within pelvic lymph node region patient undergo radical prostatectomy extend pelvic lymph node dissection , determine agreement 11C- 18F-choline PET image detection localization local metastatic disease image techniques/methods ( bone scan , CT , multiparametric 1H MRI , advance body NaF PET/CT ) , determine temporal distribution 11C- 18F-choline radiotracer patient . The tissue uptake , retention , clearance determine . An exploratory objective comparing region uptake 11C- 18F-choline PET/MR sentinel lymph node imaging perform .
DOC.criteria: Age : Patients must ≥18 year age Diagnosis : Patients must diagnosis prostate cancer histologic verification hypoechoic lesion see ultrasound . Disease Status : Unfavorable intermediate highrisk prostate Cancer ( CAPRA 510 ) Karnofsky Performance Status ≥70 Metastatic workup : Whole Body Sodium Fluoride ( NaF ) PET/CT 99mTc Bone Scan Planned undergo radical prostatectomy extend pelvic lymph node dissection Adequate bone marrow organ function define follow : Adequate bone marrow function : Leukocytes ≥ 3,000/mcL Absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1,500/mcL Platelets ≥ 100,000/mcL Adequate hepatic function : Total bilirubin within normal institutional limit AST ( SGOT ) ≤ 2.5 X institutional upper limit normal ALT ( SGPT ) ≤ 2.5 X institutional upper limit normal Adequate renal function : Creatinine within normal institutional limit OR Creatinine clearance ≥ 60 mL/min/1.73m2 patient creatinine level institutional normal Ability understand write informed consent document , willingness sign Participation would significantly delay schedule standard care therapy Karnofsky performance status < 60 Inadequate venous access Administered radioisotope within 5 physical half live prior study enrollment Have medical condition circumstance , opinion investigator would significantly decrease chance obtain reliable data , achieve study objective , complete study .
